spring-postgres.name: spring-postgres
spring-postgres.ymlContent:
version: '3.8'
services:
  app:
    image: openjdk:17
    ports:
      - '8080:8080'
    depends_on:
      - db
  db:
    image: postgres:15
    environment:
      POSTGRES_USER: user
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: pass
      POSTGRES_DB: appdb

node-redis.name: node-redis
node-redis.ymlContent:
version: '3.8'
services:
  node:
    image: node:18
    ports:
      - '3000:3000'
  redis:
    image: redis:alpine
    ports:
      - '6379:6379'

python-mongo.name: python-mongo
python-mongo.ymlContent:
version: '3.8'
services:
  app:
    image: python:3.11
    ports:
      - '5000:5000'
    volumes:
      - .:/app
    command: python app.py
    depends_on:
      - mongo
  mongo:
    image: mongo:latest
    ports:
      - '27017:27017'
